name: Your Life
description:
Your Life

... Love Work Passions Family Hobbies Sleep Friends ...

Is hard to balance
but like in The Groundhog Day
you'll keep trying over and over

Your Life 

-----------------------------------------

Credits:

Made in Global Game Jam 2019 (48h) with the theme "What does  home mean to you?"

Macarena Torralba (@Maca_Torralba): graphics
@Just_Hyuman : music
Pedro Daniel López (@PetterKun): code
Jorge Pedraza (@Deebrol): design and code

Place: Córdoba (Spain) @gamejamodb
